name: Sean Thomas
title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
about: My name is Sean Thomas. I am a student at the University of Alabama studying Management Information Systems. I graduate with my BS in Business Administration in May of 2026, and intend to continue my studies online.
I own an IT Consulting firm named Signal Surge LLC.
I am a Sergeant in the Alabama Army National Guard as a Signals Intelligence Analyst. I have a single deployment to Northwest Africa and have earned several military honors and awards.
I am a Full-Stack Software Engineer and I love creating a great User Experience on top of solid business logic.

experience.description: Researched and directed the design, launch and maintenance of online safety tools for individual labs in the College of Engineering.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant - Univ of AL
experience.description: Assisted in teaching 100+ students the basics of C# and problem solving with code.

experience.description: Responsible for maintaining Point-of-Sale services for $5 Million+ of transactions per year

experience.description: Running an IT Consulting firm focused on providing technical solutions and services. See the My Company tab for more.
